title: Rebuild and verify Dream11-like fantasy sports MVP (FantasyXI)

requirements.text: Rebuild and deploy the existing FantasyXI application so it is accessible again after the previous draft expiry, keeping all current implemented Dream11-like MVP flows intact (authentication, matches, team building, contests, scoring, leaderboards, and admin seeding).
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment is produced and the app loads successfully in a browser.
Users can sign in via Internet Identity and complete profile setup (name + avatar).

Authenticated users can: view matches, open a match, build and save an 11-player team with captain/vice-captain, browse contests for a match, join a contest with an existing team, and view My Teams/My Contests.
Admins can: seed players/matches/contests and submit scoring for a finished match; contest leaderboard reflects submitted points with captain/vice multipliers.

requirements.text: Ensure the required static brand images exist as generated assets and are available from the frontend without routing through the backend, using the exact filenames specified in project state.
acceptanceCriteria: The files are present under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames: fantasyxi-logo.dim_512x512.png and fantasyxi-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png.
The application can load these assets as static files at runtime (no backend calls needed).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if a state upgrade is required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Integrating external sports data APIs (all data remains created/managed in-app).
Payments/wallet integrations or real-money contest handling.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.

required: Modern sporty app logo with a stylized 'XI' mark in bold geometric shapes (fantasyxi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide abstract stadium-light background with dark tones and subtle grain (fantasyxi-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
